e22-co2060-Crop-Yield-Optimization-and-I.title: Crop Yield Optimization and Intelligent Plant Disease Analysis
e22-co2060-Crop-Yield-Optimization-and-I.description: This project is an integrated agricultural solution and platform consisting of an agricultural subsidy management system based on crop yield and an AI-driven plant disease scanner.

e22-co2060-MyStay-Boarding-Platform.title: MyStay Boarding Platform
e22-co2060-MyStay-Boarding-Platform.description: MyStay is a responsive boarding place finder system developed as a web application to connect landlords and tenants. The system supports listing management, location-based search, and secure user authentication while following modern UI/UX and software engineering best practices.

e22-co2060-NagroMS.title: NagroMS
e22-co2060-NagroMS.description: NagroMS is a vendor-free digital platform connecting Sri Lankan farmers with consumers, experts, and services, providing trading, guidance, and weather insights to improve profits and support sustainable agriculture.

e22-co2060-OrthoPAR-Web-Platform.title: OrthoPAR Web Platform
e22-co2060-OrthoPAR-Web-Platform.description: A clinician friendly web system for automated PAR Index calculation with integrated MLOps and secure patient data handling

e22-co2060-PearlPath.title: PearlPath
e22-co2060-PearlPath.description: A centralized platform connecting hotels across Sri Lanka. Users can search hotels, view locations on interactive maps, explore nearby attractions, book stays, and hire local tour guides. Built using React.js, Node.js/Django, MySQL/MongoDB, and Google Maps API.

e22-co2060-Web_Based_PAR_Index_System.title: Web_Based_PAR_Index_System
e22-co2060-Web_Based_PAR_Index_System.description: The Peer Assessment Rating (PAR) Index quantifies malocclusion severity in orthodontics. This project develops a web-based software system that integrates machine-learning-based orthodontic landmark detection on 3D dental models to automate PAR Index computation, focusing on scalability, reliability, and clinical usability.
